medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening weakness and fatigue for 1 week.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's weakness and fatigue worsened over the past week. He experienced multiple falls during this time, two of which occurred on the same day of presentation. He denies dizziness, lightheadedness, palpitations, or loss of consciousness before falling. He experienced decreased oral intake and vomiting on the day of presentation, with the vomit being non-bloody and non-bilious.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Hypertension 2. Hypercholesterolemia (for about one month) 3. History of testicular cancer 4. History of DVT, status post 3 months of Coumadin 5. Cerebrovascular accident (CVA) 6. Pancreatic adenocarcinoma.
medical_history.family_history: His father had prostate cancer. His mother had Alzheimer's disease. There is no known history of pancreatic or gastrointestinal cancers.
